Product Description

【Perfect processor for performance, power consumption, and value】Easily handle home, work and school tasks with Intel Celeron N4120 processor, quad-core CPU, burst frequency up to 2.60GHz; New OS Windows 11 Pro laptop;Built-in UHD Graphics 600 core graphics card, to ensure faster image processing and provide higher image quality, fluently decode 4K video, you can take online courses or watch your favorite programs.
【Large memory and storage space】 Smooth operation with built-in 8GB LPDDR4 memory；Faster data accessing speed with 128GB solid-state hard drive storage,to meet your daily multitasking and storage needs; If you need more, support the expansion of M.2 SSD to 2TB (please refer to the video below for the expansion tutorial), and support the addition of a 256GB Micro SD card.
【HD 4K viewing experience】 The laptop is equipped with a 14-inch full HD IPS display with a resolution of 1920×1080 and supports 1080P video. You can enjoy the ideal picture with bright, saturated and natural colors at any angle. It is provided Better viewing experience when watching videos and doing daily work; at the same time, it has a 2MP high-definition camera that allows you to easily video chat with friends or complete a video conference elegantly.
【High-speed data transmission&5G Wifi】 Use 5G Wifi with laptop to make your download and upload speed 2 times faster than traditional laptop at least; 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signal rate and two SuperSpeed USB 3.0 to enjoy high-speed data transmission , Work efficiently under the smooth network.
【Lightweight,portable and long battery life】The laptop weighs only 2.87 pounds and is as thin as 0.72 inches, which easily take it to anywhere;More than 7 hours battery life allowing you to recreat, study, and work all day,get the to-do list all done.We provide 12 months of warranty and lifetime technical services. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our customer service.

3.5

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.
【Upgraded】RAM is upgraded to 8GB high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once; Hard Drive is upgraded to 128GB Solid State Drive to allow faster bootup and data transfer. Original Seal is opened for upgrade O NLY
【Processor】Intel Pentium N5000 1.1GHz Quad-Core Processor (4MB Cache, Up to 2.7GHz)
【Display】15.6″ diagonal, NON-Touch HD (1366 x 768) Display, micro-edge, anti-glare. BrightView display, Enjoy your photos and movies.
【Tech Specs】1 x USB Type-C; 2 x USB Type-A; 1 x HDMI; 1 x headphone/microphone combo; 1 x multi-format SD media card reader; 1 x RJ-45.
【Windows 10 Home in S mode】You may switch to regular windows 10 and free upgrade windows 11: Press “Start button” bottom left of the screen; Select “Settings” icon above “power” icon; Select Update & Security and Activation, then Go to Store; Select “Get” option under “Switch out of S mode”; Hit Install. (If you also see an “Upgrade your edition of Windows” section, be careful not to click the “Go to the Store” link that appears there.)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

From the brand

BYYBUO is a new generation electronic product brand, which mainly produces and sells tablet and notebook computers.

BYYBUO was established with the goal of dedicating itself to providing our customers with suitable and efficient products.

We take customer experience very seriously, and we encourage customers to give us advice, which is our customer relationship philosophy.

BYYBUO Tablet

A Good Tablet Brings Fun to Your Life

SmartPad T10

2022 New High Performance Tablet

SmartPad A10

Popular Android 11 Tablet 10.1 Inch

Kids Tablet

Imagine how happy they will be

SmartPad T10 Pro

10.1” 2 in 1 Tablet with Docking Keyboard Case

Cost-effective Picture Frame

10 Inch Digital Picture Frame

Best Gift for Your Loved One

2022 Full HD Android Tablet

High Performance 2 in 1 Tablet

Cost-effective 7″ Kids Tablet

Cost-effective 7″ Kids Tablet

BYYBUO – Goal

Enabling everyone to enjoy life with digital technology is our driving force, and becoming a popular, human-friendly global brand is our goal!

BYYBUO – New Products

In the spirit of focus, innovation and efficiency, we will provide more customers with a series of more popular and more cost-effective electronic products!

Follow Me

Follow our flagship store, you will be the first to know the latest discounts and new products, let’s do it!

【Cost Effective Tablet 10.1 inch】Preferential price, multi-function, fast Internet access, reading, watching movies, games, music, study, work, dual camera, support Bluetooth 4.2, 2.4G WiFi, GPS, FM, it is a popular tablet to meet the daily leisure needs.
【Fashionable and Portable】10.1 inch tablet 1280*800 HD display screen tablets, 5 MP front camera, 8 MP rear camera. Sensitive touch screen & 2 high fidelity speaker with chamber. All metal body, exquisite appearance, looks fashionable and high-end.
【Latest Android Tablet】The Latest GMS certified Android 11 system, pre-installed Google Play supports Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Tiktok, Line, Instagram and other trendy social apps. Support various video decoding formats, have it 3.5mm stereo headphone port and MIC Port.
【High Performance】Smartpad A10 is equipped with high performance Quad-core CPU, running smoothly and naturally, suited for multi-taskin and it easy to switch between different apps. 2GB RAM 32GB ROM and external TF card supportable to 128GB. 6000mAh large capacity battery can last 12 hours for general usages, standby for up to 10 days.
【Good Gift and Service Guarantee】 This is a good gift for friends, and for your own daily leisure.it also a tablet for kids to learn and tablet for seniors easy to use. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and we will try our best for you.

10.1” 1280*800 IPS large HD display, giving you a more realistic visual experience!

Adopt G+G 2.5D touch panel, the advantages are hard and wear-resistant, corrosion-resistant, high light transmittance, smooth control and high reliability.

6000mAh long-lasting battery—- up to 12 hours mixed usage of watching, reading and over 72 hours of standby time.

Note: Battery life will vary based on device settings and Apps usage.

  • 10.1″TFT LCD (1280*800 IPS )
  • Google Android 11
  • 2GB RAM/32GB ROM (Expandable to 128GB)
  • 6000mAh Long Battery Life

What About BYYBUO Smartpad A10 Tablets ？

Why Choose BYYBUO Smartpad A10 Tablets ?

Smartpad A10 is a tablet that we focus on promoting because of its high performance and high cost performance. Multifunction and suitable for all kinds of scenes, whether family entertainment or work. It has a fashionable appearance and a gift box, it is a good gift choice for friends and relatives.

Professional and considerate pre-sales and after-sales service makes your shopping convenient and pleasant.

BYYBUO, gives you a wonderful e-life experience!

Package(Gift box):

  • Tablet x1
  • USB-C Cable x1
  • Charger x1
  • User’s manual x1
  • Maintenance Card x1

Read more

Entertainment for All

High-definition picture quality & high fidelity dual-speaker design gives you a more powerful visual & auditory experience when watching movies and listening to songs.

Lightweight design makes it easy to enjoy movies and music on the go, record beautiful scenery and moments. Make your life more happier and beautiful!

GPS sensor

Built-in GPS, Beidou, Glonass navigation sensor. A tablet suitable for use in the car to provide navigation help for your travel.

Good ideas for cooking

When you need to see the menu for cooking, this HD large screen tablet can provide you with all kinds of recipes you want, you can watch food videos while cooking, which is a good helper.

Tablet for kids

The tablet PC can bring a lot of fun for your kids, it is a good helper for children to learn knowledge, explore the unknown world, and answer children’s “why” questions.

Tablet for seniors

A tablet for seniors easy to use large screen,10.1 inch HD touch screen, simple operation page and adjustable font size are easy for seniors to operate, bring more fun to elderly and enjoy the life of digital technology.

Product Description

Please Read Before Purchase!

Please Confrim Your SIM Card’s Compatibility Before Purchasing!

2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B83G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8Ulefone Note 6 Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS, H2O Wireless …!

Note:

It will be smoother to use after booting a few minutes.If the elderly use it and need a larger display font, the font can be set to the largest in the background, which is convenient for the elders to use. At the same time, the mobile phone has a children space mode. It can limit the usage time, mobile data and apps, no need to worry that kids will indulge in games, protect their eyes as well.Due to the small memory of the Note 6 cell phone, please close unused programs in time to get a better user experience. For example, when you are not using GPS positioning, please turn it off, then you can get a longer standby experience.

Notice:

If your phone can’t work any other carriers at the first time, you need to activate the sim card on a existing phone which is support you carrier. After you receive the initial activation texts or get 3G signal, put the sim card back into the phone It should automatically pick up the carrier’s network. Or you can contact with the carrier to activate your SIM card.If your Ulefone note 6 can’t connect to data, please input the APN setting by manually, first input Operator SIM and go to settings—>Network&internet—>Moblile network—>Advanced—>Access point Names—>here can be add APN(the‘+’ icon) or change the APN (Edit any access point to change). To find APN parameters you need to manual input, you may ask the shop / website of those Operators, or you can find another handset with a correct working sim card inserted, then use the same path same approach, you can find and read the APN characters of this Operator, and then copy the same character into your note 6.

Note: Please open the back cover of the phone and remove the insulating tape on battery before starting to use. Otherwise unable to charge!

Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1Dual SIM Dual Standby128GB extra storage added via TF card(If you received the phone without insulating tape, that’s because the factory has removed the insulating tape from the battery before shipped.)

Super lightweight and compact, weights only 155g and 8.5mm thickness, golden weight ratio creates excellent holding experience, provide compact and well-balanced look and feel. Hold it in hand comfortably and carry it around with ease.

RAM/ROM: 1GB/32GB (Max. Expansion 128GB)CPU: SC7731E, Quad-core 1.3GHzGPU: Mali-T820 up to 600MHzUSB: Micro USB 5 PinMusic Format Supported: MP3, AMR, AAC, FLACImage Format Supported: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNGDimensions (inch): 6.1″*2.87“*0.33”Weight: 155g/0.34lb

6.1 Inch Water-drop In-cell Full ScreenIPS Screen720*1560 High ResolutionFullview Display92.9% Screen Ratio19:5:9 Aspect RatioSmoother Screen Sensitivity

See The World Through HD Camera

5MP Main Rear Camera

Capturing staggeringly beautiful landscape is a great enjoyment, Note 6 equipped with 5MP main rear camera up to F/2.2 aperture has exceptional vision, helping you discover unusual beauty and assisting you record every beautiful moment for lasting forever.

Superb Front Camera Rejuvenates Your Image with Beauty Mode

2MP camera with HDR and beautify function in the front interprets your features thoroughly and beautifully so as to generate stunning selfies. Whether it is against the background of the mottled tree shadows during the day or the city lights at night, a relaxing shot can amaze your protagonist moments.

Night Mode

Regardless of Light or Shade, The Beauty is Always Clear and Moving

Turn on the night scene mode to automatically optimize the shooting effect, so that the details of the photo are deep and the scene is clear and bright, shooting clear and stereoscopic masterpiece for you.

Latest Android 11 Go Edition OS

Your trendy Note 6 Unlocked Cell Phones, it will run smooth and fast based on Android 11 Go OS out of box, bringing a powerful and smooth experience. Application startup speed has been greatly improved, new privacy protection mechanism adopted will protect your privacy and security.

Mighty Quad-core Processor

Powered by powerful processor with 1GB of RAM + 32GB ROM of internal storage that can deliver sufficient performance for all your apps to run smoothly. Be amazed by the outstanding graphics performance GPU that helps output unparalleled images.

3300mAh Long-lasting Battery

Note 6 equipped with 3300mAh battery makes you know what is last endurance, there is less power consumption even you immerse yourself into hearty games and binge-watching.

Package List1 x Note 6 Smartphone(Battery included)1 x AC Power Charger(100~240V US plug)1 x Data Cable (100cm)1 x Protective Case1 x Protective Film1 x Multi-language User Manual

【Platform】: Android 11 GO OS, SC7731E Quad-core 1.3GHZ, Mali-T820 up to 600MHz, and UP to 128G Extension Storage.
【Display】:6.1” HD+ water-drop display screen, perfect with one-hand set. 155g featherweight, 8.5MM Ultra-slim Cell Phone.
【Camera】:5MP main camera up to F/2.2 Aperture + 2MP front camera. Support night mode.
【Other Functions】:Face Unlocked, GPS+GLONASS+Beidou triple navigation systems, Acceleration Sensor + L-Sensor + P-Sensor, and Four Aesthetic Colors.
【Band】: 2G-GSM B2/3/5/8, 3G-WCDMA B1/2/5/8. This is a 3G smartphone, support dual 3G network. Not 4G mobile phone.It CAN work with GSM Carriers. But Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA carriers such as Sprint & Verizon. Due to the shutdown of 2G and 3G networks of some carries, the note 6 will cannot be used. Please confirm whether the carries you are using can use it before purchasing.
This is a a very CHEAP and basic mobile phone, therefor it has only 1GB RAM and 32GB ROM. So the speed is slower than other smartphones with 2GB RAM or 4GB RAM. But it ideal as a backup phone for business trips or travel.

Product Description

Why Choose Beelink U59 Mini PC

Easy To Carry – Beelink MINI S Mini PC measures ‎4.52 x 4.01 x 1.61 inches and weighs as low as 11.35 ounces. You can hold it in your hand or put it in your business bag and carry it with you.

Cost-effective – Beelink Micro PC uses N5095CPU. Its base operating frequency is up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports a 4 MB L3 Cache.

Multiple Interfaces – The desktop computer has a unique interface designed with 4 x USB3.0 ports, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x DC Jack port, 1 x RJ45 1000M port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port, 1 x Type-C port.

Expandable Storage – The mini computers have two Internal Connector, one is M.2 2280 SSD, the other one is a 2.5-inch 7mm SATA HDD which support up to 500GB~2TB large expandable storage.

Support Auto Power On – The windows computer Support WOL (Wake On LAN) and Auto Power On functions, you can watch our demo video for operation, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact Beelink.

After-sales Service – Beelink focuses on mini pc R&D and sales. We have a professional after-sales service. As long as you purchase our products, We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

N5095 Vs J4125

Mini PC Features

𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥 𝐍𝟓𝟎𝟗𝟓 𝐂𝐏𝐔

This MINI S mini PC powered by Intel 11th Generation Quad-Core N5095 (More Faster Than 10th Generation J4125). It’s base operating frequency up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports 4MB cache. Stable low-power processor with powerful performance, say goodbye to the system freezing and buffering.

𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲

The Micro Computer is equipped with Dual HDMI 2.0 Ports. When you buy this computer, we will give you HDMI 100CM&20CM for free, you can connect two monitors at the same time, which can improve your work Efficiency.

𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐬

The mini computer has a unique interface designed with 4 x USB3.0 ports, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x DC Jack port, 1 x RJ45 1000M port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port. It can connect keyboard, mouse, camera, gamepad, monitor, TV, headset and sound, etc.

Common Question & Answer

Is Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A1: Yes, our beelink MINI S comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. There is no need for an additional activation key. You are free to use another operating system, such as Linux, Android x86, Ubuntu, or FydeOS.

Q2: How to set up Dual Screen Display?

A2: Please click and select Start>Settings>System>Display. Your PC should automatically detect your monitor and display your desktop. If you don’t see the monitor, select Detect.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

A3: Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Can I play video games?

Of course, you can play Minecraft, PUBG, Fortnite, GTA5, CS:Go, and LOL smoothly.

Powerful Performance: Beelink MINI S mini pc is powered by 11th Generation Quad-Core N5095 (More Faster Than 10th Generation J4125). The lithography process of the CPU is 10nm, and its base operating frequency is up to 2.9GHz (4C/4T) and it supports a 4MB smart cache. The micro pc Pre-installed W11 Pro 64-Bits Os, running smoothly. Create a smooth experience for your streaming video, visual home entertainment, and light office, bid farewell to system stalls and buffering.dget computadoras de escritorio
High-capacity Storage: The micro desktops computer built-in 8GB DDR4, 256GB M.2 SSD (M.2 is much better than mSATA in terms of both smaller size and higher transfer performance). The Mini Computer has two Internal Connector, one is M.2 SATA SSD 2280, the other one is a 2.5in-7mm SATA HDD which support up to 500GB~2TB large expandable storage. And also you can add a USB 3.0 hard drive port to expand 2TB HDD.
Multiple Interfaces & Function: The desktop computer adopts independently designed heat dissipation technology, and at the same time, it runs close to noiseless. The mini pc has a unique interface designed with 2 x HDMI ports, 4 x USB3.0 ports, 1 x RJ45 1000M Port, 1 x Audio Jack (HP&MIC) port. Supports connecting monitors, projectors, Mobile phones, and other equipment. Moreover, this computer supports Wake On LAN, Auto Power On, PXE Boot. To meet your various needs.
Dual Screen Display: The Micro Computer is equipped with Dual HDMI 2.0 Ports. When you buy this computer, we will give you HDMI 100CM&20CM for free, you can connect two monitors at the same time, which can improve your work Efficiency. The Beelink mini pc uses Intel UHD Graphics to support 4K HD video playback. You can easily enjoy 4K video playback, or connect to your projector as a home theater and enjoy various entertainment.
Widely Used & Safety: The Beelink Mini PC can be used for visual home entertainment, office, light games, digital security, surveillance, digital signage, billboards, media center, conference room, etc. In addition, the cheap pc also supports Linux operating system(ubuntu), meets server construction, software compilation, or other DIY needs. All of our desktop computers obtained FCC, ROSH, CE certification. We also offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online customer service.

Tulasi 2023 14 inches Full HD Windows 11 Laptop Computer

Intel Celeron Quad-Core N4120
Enjoy this Windows laptop with a 10th generation Intel Gemini Lake Celeron N4120 Processor 4 Cores 4 Threads 4MB cache,
built-in Intel UHD Graphics 600, support 4K@60Hz. Experience entertainment features and fast connectivity

12GB RAM Laptop Sufficient Storage
12GB memory for advanced multitasking, smoothly run your applications. 256GB M.2 2280 SATA3 SSD fast boot-up time and data access,
no noise, enough space for you to store pictures, music, and videos. Save files faster and store more data

Pre-install Windows 11 Pro
Tulasi T Pro Laptop with Windows 11 Pro system, experience the security and increased responsiveness of Windows laptops,
it’s very suitable for business work, school study, and home entertainment.

Tulasi T Pro Laptop Technical Specifications:

CPU: Intel 4-Cores N4120 processor, 4M Cache, up to 2.60 GHz

GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600, support 4K@60Hz

Memory: 12GB LPDDR4

Storage: M.2 SATA3 256GB SSD (expandable up to 1 TB)

Display: 14 inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 300 nits

Operating System: Pre-install Windows 11 Pro

Connectivity: 2.4G/5G WiFi support 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 4.2

Ports: 2 x USB3.0 ports, 1 x Mini HD, 1 x Micro SD slot, 1 x Headphone Jack, 1 x DC

Keyboard: Chocolate keyboard with lift design

Webcam: 0.3M camera and dual array digital microphones

Battery: 34.2Wh Polymer lithium-ion battery, up to 6 hours

Color: Space gray

Dimensions: 12.8*8.3*0.37 – 0.65inch / 325*212*9.5 – 16.5mm

Weight: 2.88lb / 1.3kg

What’s in the box: Tulasi T Pro Laptop x 1, Power Adapter x 1
[ ULTRA THIN AND PORTABLE ] – This computer laptop is only 0.37 to 0.65 inch thin and lightweighs only 2.88 lb, it’s easy to take this laptop pc anywhere, It also gets an 34.2Wh high-capacity battery that can last up to 6 hours long battery life.
[ RELIABLE PERFORMANCE ] – Tackle your daily tasks easily and quickly with the performance of a Intel Gemini Lake Quad-Core Processor, 4M cache, Base Frequency 1.1 GHz Burst Frequency 2.60 GHz, built-in Intel UHD Graphics 600, Support 4K@60Hz.
[ 12GB RAM + 256GB SSD ] – 12GB LPDDR4 RAM for advanced multitasking, smoothly run your programs, and browser tabs. with 256GB M.2 SATA3 SSD storage, experience 3x faster data transfer performance than a traditional eMMC hard drive, faster boot time.
[ 14 INCHES LAPTOP WINDOWS 11 ] – It comes with Windows 11 Pro system, new look and feel, maximize your productivity, with a 14 inches micro-edge Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS screen, you can enjoy clear, bright and vivid picture.
[ CONVENIENCE AND WARRANTY ] – Experience smooth wireless connection with 802.11.ac 2.4G/5G WiFi and Bluetooth 4.2. Rich-ports include 2 USB 3.0, Mini HD, DC Charging, Audio jack, Micro SD slot. All Tulasi laptops come with a 1-year warranty, you can enjoy it.
